articles.title: Jarrod Ramos Sentenced to Five Life Terms in Capital Gazette Attack - The New York Times
articles.description: Jarrod W. Ramos had pleaded guilty to murder charges in one of the deadliest attacks on American journalists. In July, a jury found him criminally responsible for the 2018 shooting in Maryland’s capital.
articles.content: Six survivors also testified at the trial, recalling the day that Mr. Ramos walked through their workplace with a 12-gauge shotgun, killing five colleagues: Gerald Fischman, 61, the editorial page ed… [+948 chars]

articles.title: Biden gets COVID-19 vaccine booster shot - Global Times
articles.description: US President Joe Biden received a COVID-19 vaccine booster on Monday and told Americans still resisting the shots that they are damaging the country.
